kleopatra.name: Kleopatra
kleopatra.description: Alanya's most famous beach district — golden sands, turquoise waters, and vibrant nightlife right at your doorstep.

mahmutlar.name: Mahmutlar
mahmutlar.description: The fastest-growing coastal district with modern residences, affordable luxury, and strong rental demand from international buyers.

kestel.name: Kestel
kestel.description: A tranquil seaside neighborhood offering panoramic sea views, family-friendly atmosphere, and excellent value for money.

oba.name: Oba
oba.description: Alanya's upscale residential hub with premium complexes, lush greenery, and proximity to city center amenities.

tosmur.name: Tosmur
tosmur.description: A peaceful riverside district between Alanya and Dim River, known for nature walks and serene living.

cikcilli.name: Cikcilli
cikcilli.description: A hillside neighborhood with stunning Taurus Mountain views, modern apartments, and a growing expat community.

kargicak.name: Kargıcak
kargicak.description: Exclusive hilltop villas and residences offering breathtaking Mediterranean panoramas and ultimate privacy.

avsallar.name: Avsallar
avsallar.description: A popular beachfront district with all-inclusive resort vibes, affordable apartments, and strong holiday rental returns.

meta.title: About Us | EmlakBanq
meta.description: Meet EmlakBanq - 100+ experts, two offices, Alanya's trusted luxury real estate advisors.

about.heading: About EmlakBanq
about.subtitle: Alanya's trusted partner for luxury real estate investment

story.label: Our Story
story.title: Our Story
story.p1: EmlakBanq was founded with a singular vision: to redefine the luxury real estate experience in Alanya. What started as a boutique advisory firm has grown into a global platform with over 100 expert advisors operating across two continents.
story.p2: We believe that buying property in Alanya should be as exciting as the city itself — transparent, seamless, and rewarding. Our team combines deep market knowledge with a genuine passion for helping investors find their perfect match.
story.p3: From off-plan opportunities to ready-to-move villas, from Turkish Citizenship assistance to after-sales property management, we are your end-to-end partner in Alanya real estate.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: No hidden fees, no inflated promises. Honest, data-backed guidance at every step.

expertise.title: Expertise
expertise.description: Certified professionals with years of Alanya market experience.

global.title: Global Reach
global.description: Offices in Alanya and Istanbul, serving clients from over 40 countries.

client.title: Client First
client.description: Every decision guided by what's best for our clients' investment goals.

hero.subtitle: Bridging continents, connecting investors with the world's most dynamic property market through unmatched expertise and unwavering integrity.

offices.label: Global Presence
offices.title: Our Offices
offices.description: Strategically positioned at the crossroads of global investment, our offices are your gateway to Alanya's luxury property market.

cta.title: Ready to Begin Your Journey?
cta.description: Connect with our team of experts and discover the perfect property for your lifestyle and investment goals.

meta.title: Turkish Citizenship | EmlakBanq
meta.description: Learn about Alanya Turkish Citizenship through real estate investment.

goldenVisa.heading: Your Gateway to Turkish Citizenship Through Property Investment
goldenVisa.subtitle: Citizenship by Investment

hero.subtitle: Turkey's Citizenship by Investment programme offers full citizenship to property investors, providing access to a vibrant country that bridges Europe and Asia.
hero.intro: EmlakBanq provides end-to-end citizenship assistance — from identifying qualifying properties to completing your application. Our dedicated team has helped hundreds of families obtain Turkish citizenship with confidence.

benefits.label: Why Turkish Citizenship?
benefits.title: Benefits of Turkish Citizenship by Investment

renewable_residency.title: Full Citizenship Rights
renewable_residency.description: Obtain permanent Turkish citizenship for yourself and your family. Not just residency — full citizenship rights.

family_sponsorship.title: Family Included
family_sponsorship.description: Your spouse and children under 18 can be included in the same application and receive citizenship together.

business_ownership.title: Business Freedom
business_ownership.description: As a Turkish citizen, establish and manage businesses in Turkey without any restrictions.

ease_of_travel.title: Visa-Free Travel
ease_of_travel.description: Travel visa-free or with visa-on-arrival to 110+ countries with a Turkish passport.

tax_free.title: Competitive Tax System
tax_free.description: Benefit from competitive tax rates, special incentives for foreign investors, and double taxation prevention treaties.

premium_services.title: Quality Living Standards
premium_services.description: As a Turkish citizen, gain full access to world-class healthcare, education, and banking services.

eligibility.label: Requirements
eligibility.title: Eligibility Criteria
eligibility.description: The following criteria apply to the property investor route of Turkey's Citizenship by Investment programme.
eligibility.item1: Purchase a property in Turkey with a minimum value of USD 400,000.
eligibility.item2: The property must not be sold for at least 3 years from the date of purchase.
eligibility.item3: Property can be residential or commercial; completed or under-construction projects are eligible.
eligibility.item4: An official valuation report from the Title Deed Office is required.
eligibility.item5: Application must be submitted after the property is registered with the Land Registry and Cadastre Directorate.
eligibility.item6: No minimum salary requirement or employment status restrictions apply for the property investor route.

step1.title: Property Selection
step1.description: Choose a qualifying property worth USD 400,000+ with guidance from our expert advisors.

step2.title: Purchase & Registration
step2.description: Complete the purchase and register the property with the Land Registry and Cadastre Directorate.

step3.title: Document Preparation
step3.description: Gather required documents including passport, birth certificate, title deed, and valuation report.

step4.title: Citizenship Approval
step4.description: Submit your application and obtain your Turkish citizenship within 3-6 months.

cta.title: Start Your Citizenship Journey
cta.description: Our expert advisors will guide you from property selection to citizenship approval. Book a free consultation today.
